entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, 5.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Victoria Harbour 2:00 PM PST Saturday 04 March 2023
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: 5.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.6 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 79 %
Dewpoint: 2.2°C
Wind: ESE 37 km/h gust 57 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 1

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of showers. High 7. POP 70%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 70 percent chance of showers. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 near the water. High 7. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Saturday 04 March 2023
